interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: daji hair Straight Wave Ombre Human 3 Bundles P4/27 Two Tone Brazilian Virgin Extensions Double Weft Highlight 100G/Pcs Light Brown Mixed Blonde Weave (22 24 26Inch)
Review Date: 2021/10/27
Store: daji hair
Product Description: ["Choose Daji Hair,Choose Rest Assured！We Are Located In Xuchang,Henan Province,China'S Factory;Global Wig Base,With More Than 15 Years Of Wig Production Experience!The Main Products Of The Factory Are Hair Bundles,Closure &Front,Hair Wigs,Heandband Wgis,Etc Hair Material:100% Unprocessed Brazilian Virgin Highlight Human Hair Ombre Bundles Material Grade: 12A Virgin Human Hair 3 Bundles. Hair Weft: Machine Double Weft Hair Advantage:Nature Look,Suit for Any Occasion Hair Color: Two Tone #P4/27(Light Brown Mixed Blonde);Suitable Dyed and Bleached to Any Colors. Hair Weight&Length: 95-100g/Bundle(3.3-3.5oz),8-26 inches (Please stretch the hair to straight and then measure). Return Policy: No Reason to Return No Time Limited (The Hair without Used or Damage, as new as you received). Warm Tips:", 'If There Is Any Requirement, Please Feel Free To Contact Us Before You Place Orders.We Will Send the Wig In Medium Cap Size and Medium Brown Cap Color If Not Receive Change Message', "QA: Q1:Is this 100% Human Hair? A:Yes.Testing by BURNING- Human hair will show white smoke while burning and then turn to ash; Synthetic hair will show black smoke and will be a sticky ball after burning. Q2:Hair Smell? A:100% chemical free,it may have local shampoo smell,but can be removed by cowashing with shampoo and conditioner. Q3: How long does it last? A:This hair can last for long time depending on how you maintain it.Usually my customers use for more than a year.Contact Us To Explain The Suitable Use Method For You! Q4:How Many Bundles Do I need for A Full Head? A:3 bundles is enough for the Full Head. If You Like Thicker or Need Longer Hair, It's Better to Wear one More Bundle."]
Average Rating: 3.0

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Hair Preferences:** The user maintains a strong preference for human hair products and straight styles that deliver a natural look. Having recently experienced significant disappointment with a product that did not meet their expectations for fullness and length, they are now even more cautious about curly textures and their associated claims.

- **Quality Expectations:** High standards for product quality persist, particularly regarding authenticity and durability. Their latest negative experience has intensified their scrutiny of brand marketing, leading to greater skepticism about product claims that don’t deliver.

- **Detail Orientation:** Transparency in product descriptions is increasingly vital for the user, who meticulously evaluates new purchases. They are now especially critical of inconsistencies between advertised quality and actual product performance, showcasing a commitment to demanding accountability from brands.

- **Critical Reviewer:** As a straightforward reviewer, the user’s frustrations with misleading products have bolstered their inclination to voice dissatisfaction more emphatically. Their focus has shifted significantly toward ensuring that their reviews reflect their heightened standards following recent disappointments.

- **Length Preferences:** While still favoring longer hair extensions for versatility, the user remains vigilant in assessing new styles and lengths to ensure they conform to their strict quality requirements.

Overall, the user is dedicated to sourcing high-quality, authentic hair products that satisfy their precise criteria, exhibiting a heightened cautiousness in their evaluations after recent experiences.
